{{codepointer|Status change}} '''A_SetHealth'''(int ''health'' [, int ''pointer''])
==Usage== Sets the [[actor pointer|pointed to actor's]] health to ''health''. This function cannot kill an actor; if the defined health is 0 or less, it will set the actor's health to 1 instead.
Functions such as [[Template:Planned Parenthood|{{c|A_Kill*}} or {{c|A_Damage*}}]] should be used for such a task, instead.
===Parameters=== *''health'': The health value to set for the actor. Valid values are 1 and above. *''pointer'': The actor to set its health. This is an [[actor pointer]]. Default is {{c|{{const|AAPTR_DEFAULT}}}}, which corresponds to the calling actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
